extension.news: JAVStream v0.92.3(31st October 2016) - Fixed issue so status dialog reflects the correct amount of sites processed - Fixed issue stopping JAVHDFree, Jav-Stream, StreamJavPorn, JPIdols, StreamingJAV displaying results - Fixed bug which caused infinite loop if canceling a search - Fixed bug that stopped search results showing if term had already been searched for - Fixed bug that stopped sources list showing for some videos - Fixed issue from JAV4K from displaying results in search - Fixed Flashx playback (still needs 100%) - Fixed Kodi17 bug that would cause Source Search dialog to appear again over the playing video - Fixed error which caused translation to crash when over quota - Rewrote uncensored code for all providers to display more results - Rewrote video sources to be ordered by qualtiy first - Added Xonline, FreeJav, Javocado, Popjav, Jav18, JAVUS, JAVGo, GAIMUP - Added support for BigFile, vidto.me, RapidVideo, qwertycdn playback - Up'd default timeout from 10 seconds to 20 seconds - Removed EroPoi, JAV69, JavShow, IkuJAV, JAVStream365, JAVWest, JavZab, Korean720, PhimSexJav, Terlarng, YouJAV - Temprarily taken off JavPortal, fix in next update
